title: New reports say business travel isn’t going back to normal — ever
description: High travel costs, tighter corporate budgets and virtual meetings have permanently changed business travel, according to new corporate travel reports.

title: NBCUniversal CEO Jeff Shell is out after admitting inappropriate relationship
description: NBCUniversal CEO Jeff Shell left the company immediately after admitting inappropriate relationship with woman.

title: Bed Bath & Beyond files for bankruptcy protection
description: Bed Bath & Beyond has filed for bankruptcy after a series of last-ditch efforts to raise enough equity to keep the business alive failed at the eleventh hour.
